companyInfo.Competitors: State Farm, Farmers Insurance Group, Nationwide

jobDescription: Deep Learning ConsultantRole: Invent, design, and prototype next-generation technologies in the area of image recognition, text mining, information retrieval, computer vision, and image processing. Work closely with other members of the Data Science & Analytics Lab in a collaborative, multi-disciplinary environment. Requirements:MS or PhD in computer science or related field, or a candidate for one of these degreesStrong knowledge of prototype programming languages such as Python, Matlab, or RMachine learning background with multi-model data such as speech, text, and imageryExperience with deep learning frameworks such as Caffe, Torch7/ PyTorch, or TensorFlowStrong analytical and verbal communication skillsBonus: experience with geospatial data, multi-threading, GPU computing, or SparkTerm:Current need is for a full-time position for a minimum of 6 months with extensions likely based on strong performance
